Exemplar: A jekyll theme/template. Uses Sass, Bourbon, and Neat. Gitdrop: Mac app to quickly drag + drop files onto Github Gitwar: 2 player text-based games with Git as the transfer protocol Key Selector: jQuery Plugin for allowing the selection/transposition of music keys LegoJS: Reusable JavaScript UI Components Otter Pop: The world's greatest jekyll theme paper-router: Organize your Node apps Spamthe.net: Link spammer for Twitter, IRC and the web Vimdeck: Presentations in VIM - Nothing but plain text, code snippets, and ASCII art Walkie: Basecamp notifications via node.js and OS X 10.8 Notification Center
